translations: v．喷漆修饰：使用喷漆工具对照片、画作等进行修饰或润色。
· The photo was airbrushed to remove any imperfections.
这张照片经过喷漆修饰，去除了任何瑕疵。

sentences.sentence: Somebody had been airbrushed out of the picture.
sentences.translation: 画面上有个人用气笔给抹掉了。

sentences.sentence: Film formers can be added to ensure a prolonged setting of the airbrushed makeup.
sentences.translation: 可以加入成膜剂以确保长期的喷枪化妆的定妆效果。

sentences.sentence: They were faces you never expected to see except perhaps on the airbrushed pages of a fashion magazine.
sentences.translation: 他们的面孔，你不会有机会在时尚杂志的彩页以外的任何地方看到这样的面孔。
